questions.question: How do you know if an online game is suitable for someone your age?

choices.answer: play the game to see if it is suitable
look at the PEGI game rating

questions.question: Which of the following is a good username to use in an online game?
If another player used bad language or makes offensive comments what should you do?

choices.answer: Block the player and report them to admin. Tell an adult.
Keep it to yourself so you can carry on playing the game.
Reply using bad language and offensive comments.

questions.question: I met someone in an online game who wants to meet up. They live nearby.  Can I go?

choices.answer: no, tell an adult and report

questions.question: In an online game a message pops up saying Click here to win a Million pounds. What do you do?

choices.answer: Ask your friends what to do
